trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "RadioButton".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém "RadioButton".

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controlo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>, this method returns a `this` pointer.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>, este método devolve um `this` apontador.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, este método devolve um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor na enumeração.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que suporte o padrão de controlo se patternInterface é um valor suportado; caso contrário, .
